程序包 org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.vertex

类 BaseVertexCentricQuery

java.lang.Object
org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.BaseQuery
org.janusgraph.graphdb.query.vertex.BaseVertexCentricQuery
所有已实现的接口:
ProfileObservable, Query
直接已知子类:
VertexCentricQuery
public class BaseVertexCentricQuery
extends BaseQuery
implements ProfileObservable
The base implementation for VertexCentricQuery which does not yet contain a reference to the base vertex of the query. This query is constructed by BasicVertexCentricQueryBuilder.constructQuery(org.janusgraph.graphdb.internal.RelationCategory) and then later extended by single or multi-vertex query which add the vertex to the query.

This class override many methods in ElementQuery - check there for a description.

作者:
Matthias Broecheler (me@matthiasb.com)

  • 字段详细资料

    • condition

      protected final Condition<JanusGraphRelation> condition
      The condition of this query

    • queries

      protected final List<BackendQueryHolder<SliceQuery>> queries
      The individual component SliceQuery of this query. This query is considered an OR of the individual components (possibly filtered by the condition if not fitted).

    • direction

      protected final org.apache.tinkerpop.gremlin.structure.Direction direction
      The direction condition of this query. This is duplicated from the condition for efficiency reasons.
